title: Board Game-Based Science Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Science problem-solving project implementation to strengthen core competencies for the Fourth Industrial Revolution

learning_goals: Science problem-solving strategies can be systematically designed using board game mechanics.
The ability to reconstruct game elements (rules, feedback, collaboration) to align with educational objectives is assessed.
The effectiveness of game-based learning design can be analyzed through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
